import React, { Component } from 'react' import '../Cardslider.css' class Slide extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { x:0 } } prev=()=>{ let y; y=-(parseInt(this.state.x)+345); if(y*-1<=2000){ document.getElementById("scroll1").style.transform="translateX("+y+"px)"; this.setState({ x:-y }) } } next=()=>{ let b; var a=this.state.x; b=-(parseInt(a)-640); if(b<=0){ document.getElementById("scroll1").style.transform="translateX("+b+"px)"; a=-b; this.setState({ x:a }) } } render() { return (
